 <#515DAEFF>Vera Schöniger</color> 
Art, Texts, Sound&Music, Publisher: 
<#515DAEFF>Elfi Schöniger</color> 

Inspired by the book  “The Legend of Conner MacSheep” by <#515DAEFF>Elfi Schöniger</color>.
Under which name do you want to compete?
Do you really want to leave?
You matched your highscore of {0} points again!
Congratulations! Your old highscore was {0}. Your new highscore is {1}!
Pity! Your new score {1} is lower than your highscore {0}. Better luck next time!

Welcome at the 
Jump for Height

<line-height=80%>Whoever kicks the bundle of heather from the wall without tearing down any stones gets the highest score and wins. The bundle of heather counts for {0} points, for every stone that falls, {1} points are subtracted. 
Good Luck!
Goal: You have to push your oppponent back until all four of your legs are right of the chalk line.

You can increase your power by hitting the arrow keys right as the wool pieces land inside the basket. The more precise you are, the more points and pushing power you gain. Every mistake costs some points.

Do you really want to delete all Highscores? 
This is irreversible!
Goal Solve the puzzles with as few tries as possible.
You will find a preview of the puzzle on the wall.
Move the mouse to the edges of the screen to look up and down.

Clicking on a puzzle piece lifts it up. With right click you can rotate it clockwise. With another click you can put it down in the puzzle area. If it is in the wrong position, it will jump back into the holding area. Every false try decreases your score.
Enter here to start the game.
Well done, now you're ready for Puzzling Patterns! Enter the tower to play the game.
